chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: Hello all, my name is Krish Nayak and welcome to my YouTube channel.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: So guys, just a few days back, I had announced that I'll be starting the NLP live community

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: sessions for machine learning and deep learning from tomorrow, that is Tuesday.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: And if I say the exact date, it is nothing but 14 June 2022.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: We'll be starting the session from 7pm and every day we'll try to do at least two hours

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: of session.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: And remember, we'll not be having the sessions on weekends.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: So mostly from Monday to Friday, we'll try to do it in this specific way.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: But yes, we are going to start it from Tuesday, that is tomorrow.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: Now, many people have asked me about the prerequisites to attend the NLP session.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: Guys, I understand I've taken a lot of community sessions.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: I started with stats, machine learning, Python, you know, then we also saw deep learning.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: So if I'm saying that, okay, I'll be teaching you NLP and this will be from basics.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: We'll also solve a lot of end-to-end projects.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: So you need to be good at Python.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: You need to be good at machine learning.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: You need to know, you probably should have solved at least one end-to-end problem statement

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: so that you'll be able to focus over here.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: But again, my main thing will be that I'll try to explain you in a very basic way and

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: probably try to explain you in a better way so that you can also implement all these things.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: Now, initially, we'll start with NLP for machine learning.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: You know, we will be learning different, different things.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: We'll be learning techniques like bag of words, TF, IDF.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: We'll be seeing what is word embedding, word2vec, you know.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: We'll be solving a lot of problem statements.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: We'll be using libraries like NLTK, SPC, Gensim.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: We'll try to see different, different things with respect to that.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: That is how we are going to start.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: Later, once we complete with some end-to-end projects, then we are going to move towards

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: deep learning.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: And deep learning will be starting with RNN, that is Recurrent Neural Network, LSTM Recurrent

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: Neural Network.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: We'll understand word embedding.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: We'll understand word2vec over there also and how we can use it.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: Apart from that, we'll also be learning Transformers and BERT.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: And many people have also requested me to cover Hugging Face Transformers.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: So that part also, I will make sure that I'll cover it.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: So the most important thing is your dedication, better internet.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: And yes, you need to come at 7pm and we'll try to cover that.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: Every day we'll be having one to two hours of session.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: And in this session, we'll also try to, you know, keep some kind of assignments, quizzes,

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: rewards, you know, so that everybody will be able to participate in a better way.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: We'll try to keep it a little bit competitive so that everybody will be able to understand.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: But my promise is that if you are attending session, probably let's say for 15 days, 20 days, it may go.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: Max to max 15 days, it may go.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: So you will definitely be able to crack any kind of interviews.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: So that is what I'm actually looking for.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: And that is my aim.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: From your side, good amount of dedications.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: And these are some of the prerequisites.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: Practice it.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: I know many people may not be knowing RNN, CNN, but see my community sessions that they are already uploaded

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: because we are probably going to start NLP for deep learning from next week.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: Please make sure that you also enroll for the dashboard that is given in the description

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: because I'll be putting all the materials over there so that you can actually use it any point of time whenever you want.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: So all the sessions will be live.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: And yes, I will see you all in the live session.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: This was it for my side.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: Please make sure that you subscribe to the channel.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: Press the bell notification icon so that whenever I go live, you get the notification.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: You also start attending the classes along with me.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: Right.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: So I'll see you all in the next video.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: Have a great day.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: Thank you, one doll.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: Bye bye.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: Bye bye.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: My only request is that please share with everyone the specific video.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: Tag me in LinkedIn.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: Tag iNeuron in the LinkedIn.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: And yes, I'll see you all in the next video.

chunks.title: Prerequisites For NLP Live Community Session For ML And DL
chunks.text: Bye bye.

chunks.text: Take care.
